message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and offers unparalleled value. Given its significance to you, I believe it's worth more than $8,000. Considering its true worth of $12,000 to you, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, ensuring you get the best deal possible. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.
